name: Ritz for Backpackers

reviews.text: I was quite shocked to read some if the reviews of this place after we found it one of the best we have been to. Ok we did stay in a double room that wasn't near the bar below so we were lucky I think.
reviews.title: Really helpful staff, in a friendly hostel

reviews.text: We had a double room, they are fairly basic, a bed, 2 bedside cabinets and a wardrobe. Our bed was unbelievably uncomfortable as you could feel each and ever sprung it had, but the next morning we went to complain about this and they were really good about it, and ordered us a brand new bed which arrived that afternoon! Excellent service!
reviews.title: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!!!

reviews.text: The alleged "Secure Storage Area" is about as secure as leaving your luggage on the street. Staff hand keys out to anybody who asks. My friend had a jumper stolen whilst our luggage was stowed and one of the cleaners spilt bleach all over my gf's bag and ruined it (as storage area doubles as cleaning supplies storage) but didn't own up to it so it was a nice surprise when we came to get our luggage. Rooms were filthy and the bathrooms were worse. The noise from the pub below makes sleep impossible. Would advise anyone considering staying here to avoid it like the plague!
reviews.title: Don't Do It!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My friends and I had a terrible experience at The Ritz in St. Kilda.
reviews.title: The Ritz was just what i wanted

reviews.text: We checked in and thought everything had gone smoothly, they allowed up to place our bags in their "secure" luggage storage. We went out for the day under the assumption that our things would be stored safely and securely. When we arrived back to change for dinner and retrieve our things we noticed that a container of bleach had leaked all over my friends new Country Road bag; and as if that weren't bad enough, someone riffled though her things in an attempt to "cover up the damage." Meanwhile, I had tied a green jumper to my bag which went missing. The staff was almost clueless and told us to wait for the owner the next day.
reviews.title: BEST PLACE EVER!!!!!!

reviews.text: Don't stay in this hostel, as another person commented this place is so intimating, and she couldn't of hit the nail more on the head, people here are so rude.
reviews.title: Great location but absolute dump

reviews.text: The rooms are so basic so don't mind the pics they have up, the windows are single glaze and are traditional sash window which provide zero sound prevention, and our room was right above smoking room so the smell of smoke and the noise from below is so frustrating.
reviews.title: great location but

reviews.text: This place should be avoided, there are a lot better places to stay such as habitat hq and Xbase.
reviews.title: Friendly and welcoming!

reviews.text: if your not 20 anymore, you feel awkward... this is really a party location in beautiful and outgoing st.kilda... so nothing wrong with it. however you need to be prepared...
reviews.title: Not welcomed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: + great location
reviews.title: Best hostel I have ever stayed in!

reviews.text: I think the Ritz for Backpackers gets a tough time on tripadvisor - i was dreading this place but it really wasn't that bad at all!!
reviews.title: Better than expected!!!

reviews.text: The bathrooms were clean and the shower was awesome! My boyfriend and I had room 208 which was very clean.  There was a laminated floor which was great as most hostels I've been to in Oz have ancient sticky, smelly carpets in the rooms!   Bed was really comfy and the bedding was nice and clean.  Laundry was cheap and fast!!!
reviews.title: The [--]

reviews.text: Location was great, plenty of tram stops nearby and only a 20 min ride to the city. It's only a few minutes walk to lots of bars and restaurants and about 10 mins walk to Acland St which has even more bars ad restaurants.
reviews.title: Would not recommend!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As for cheap deals on drink in St Kilda...after 7pm you've had it (this seems to be the case all over Melbourne)  but Apartment 29 on Fitzroy St has good deals all night if you can put up with the terrible music.
reviews.title: Good for a few nights but not long term

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Ritz is above a pub, we only heard the loud music on the Friday night, it was really loud but the only way around it is to get drunk...sleeping through the noise is so much easier!
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay here again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There's really nothing that I could complain about during my 2 weeks here. I am currently travelling Australia with my girlfriend and we've already seen a couple of Hostels here and this is definitely the best. The common room is really big and has a pool-table, several couches and a big flatscreen.
reviews.title: Our Best Hostel in OZ so far

reviews.text: Due to the hostel program like Cheese & Wine Night or free BBQ the common room usually fills with people and you're to get to know each other.
reviews.title: Not a nice place

reviews.text: Also the room itself was really nice. We stayed in a 5-Bed dorm, beds were really comfortable and the room was clean and quite big compared to other hostels.
reviews.title: Avoid-Worst hostel I have ever stayed in!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Next point is the free pancake breakfast: The pankcakes are always delicious but you sometimes need to wait a couple of minutes to get you next as there are usally about 6 to 10 people at the table.
reviews.title: Awful - worst place we stayed in during our trip!

reviews.text: I agree that the Ritz is a party hostel, but what else would you expect from a hostel in St.Kilda? And although most of the backpackers start partying in the common room, you are usually able to sleep as the room is:
reviews.title: Great place if you like parties!

aka: Ritz For Backpackers Hotel St Kilda
